post.title: Band and Band Front Unifrom Turn In Reminder
post.description:

This is a reminder about Uniform Turn In.

post.content:
Hi Band Families,

This is a reminder about Uniform Turn In.

All Uniforms will be turned in to our new uniform room, room 310. It is on the first floor, located in the hallway behind the community room.

Band Uniform Turn In Dates:

  • Friday, November 21, from 6pm to 8pm
  • Monday, November 24, from 6pm to 8pm.

When You turn in your band uniform you will need:

  1. Dry cleaned Uniform, including football pants, contest pants and jacket, in the plastic dry-cleaner bag with receipt attached.
  2. Clean and dry raincoat
  3. Clean and dry garment bag
  4. Clean hat (inside and out)
  5. Large plastic hanger the uniform came on when it was given out.

Band Front Uniform Turn In Date:

Monday, November 24, from 6pm to 8pm.

When you turn in your band front uniform you will need:

  1. Football uniform (machine wash the unitard and lay it flat to dry; do not wash or dry clean the gold jacket)
  2. Contest uniform (as is; do not wash or dry-clean)
  3. Clean and dry raincoat
  4. Clean and dry garment bag
  5. Hanger the raincoat came on

Thank you!
The Uniform Committees
